author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sasikala at temple

Chief Minister Jayalalithaa’s confidante Sasikala visited Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple here on Thursday. On arrival, temple priests received her with honours. She was in the temple for about 45 minutes.

A HR and CE official said that it was a private visit, and a few persons accompanying her even prevented news photographers and videographers near them. Later, she proceeded to Palani Dhandayuthapani Swami Temple. There was a good number of police present in the temple, though the police maintained it was a normal strength.
title: Sasikala visits Meenakshi temple
